revision.text:
{{delete|Not a ZDoom mod, so outside of this wiki's scope.}} The HTC was a community project aiming to make a 3 episode Heretic Megawad that would run on limit removing ports that support Heretic (i.e. Doomsday, ZDoom etc). Below details who did what in alphabetical order: '''MAPS''' EPISODE1:
Alterworldruler (E1M1)
CodenniumRed (E1M7)
Kaiser (E1M4)
Kaiser Wilhelm (E1M2)
Ler (E1M5+E1M6)
Lord Z (E1M9)
Snarboo (E1M3)
TV (E1M8)
EPISODE2:
Fenris Wolf (E2M9)
Ismaele (E2M3)
Lord Z (E2M4)
Lupinx Kassman (E2M7)
Magic Sofa (E2M1)
Pcorf (E2M2)
Rf (E2M8)
Torn (E2M6)
Ultimate Doomer (E2M5)
Vermil (E2M7)
EPISODE3:
Daimon (E3M5+E3M9)
Dreadopp (E3M3+E3M8)
Lorenzo (E3M2)
Magic Sofa (E3M4)
Mivalekan (E3M6)
Tatsurd-Cacocaco (E3M7)
Sp_d00d (E3M1)
MISC STUFF IDEA: Torn
PROJECT COORDINATORS : Ler and Vermil TITLE GRAPHICS: TV Texture resources based off 'Medieval Texture Resource' by Esselfortium and RottKing ADDITIONAL MAPPING: Vermil
